item.description:
When I went on @BanklessHQ with @pumatheuma, we discussed why ZK is so bullish for Ethereum

@PhalaNetwork is showing what ZK + OP-Succinct can do for one rollup today

Conduit is all about helping rollups use the latest + best tech for their use case. This is the latest example

nitter.freedit.eu/conduitxyz/status/1882489673861464485#m

item.title:
RT by @KAndrewHuang: I was asked today if I still believe in Ethereum.
@ProofOfPlay was started because of a belief in the world computer. It was magic to deploy and run my first contract in the "ether".
There are, of course, tons of issues with the Ethereum ecosystem, but there's no replacement for it in terms of the ability to scale while staying decentralized. I view all of the discourse around the EF and the future of Ethereum as healthy and necessary.
If you've never been in a high-performing / fast-moving org before, these discussions are how the sausage gets made -- it's how evolution happens.
So, we're doubling down on the Ethereum ecosystem by working with multiple EVM chains and will continue building performant, fully onchain applications capable of servicing millions of users. PoP is already running two of the highest throughput EVM chains (Apex and Boss) and can attest to the viability for L2s/L3s to enable infinite scalability.
Ethereum is decentralized, and nothing is stopping ambitious, driven builders from pushing the world computer to its absolute potential.
Any other belief is limiting -- maximum agency, always
item.dc:creator: @amittm
item.description:
I was asked today if I still believe in Ethereum.

@ProofOfPlay was started because of a belief in the world computer. It was magic to deploy and run my first contract in the "ether".

There are, of course, tons of issues with the Ethereum ecosystem, but there's no replacement for it in terms of the ability to scale while staying decentralized. I view all of the discourse around the EF and the future of Ethereum as healthy and necessary.

If you've never been in a high-performing / fast-moving org before, these discussions are how the sausage gets made -- it's how evolution happens.

So, we're doubling down on the Ethereum ecosystem by working with multiple EVM chains and will continue building performant, fully onchain applications capable of servicing millions of users. PoP is already running two of the highest throughput EVM chains (Apex and Boss) and can attest to the viability for L2s/L3s to enable infinite scalability.

Ethereum is decentralized, and nothing is stopping ambitious, driven builders from pushing the world computer to its absolute potential.

Any other belief is limiting -- maximum agency, always

item.title:
RT by @KAndrewHuang: Conduit Hub is our rollup directory, with:
API keys for RPCs on Conduit chains Config files to run a node Smart contract addresses & more
It's everything you need to build on chains like @modenetwork, @GravityChain, @build_on_bob, @PhalaNetwork, @use_corn, & @ithacaxyz Odyssey
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Conduit Hub is our rollup directory, with:

API keys for RPCs on Conduit chains
Config files to run a node
Smart contract addresses & more

It's everything you need to build on chains like @modenetwork, @GravityChain, @build_on_bob, @PhalaNetwork, @use_corn, & @ithacaxyz Odyssey

item.title:
I understand people can find memecoins and the subject matter distasteful
But crypto is heavily path-dependent and ETH community should ask itself, why was this not on ETH or any of its rollups
Big W for Solana no matter how you slice it, congrats to them
item.dc:creator: @KAndrewHuang

item.title:
RT by @KAndrewHuang: The G7 Testnet from @G7_DAO is now public!
The private testnet created incredible momentum and we expect even more game developers to deploy during this public phase.
Mainnet launch 🔜
2025 is the year of onchain gaming
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz

item.title:
RT by @KAndrewHuang: Proud moment for our customer @derivexyz 🐎
$9M to $1.4B weekly trading volume in one year
The biggest ever onchain options trade
A leader in DeFAI
And now the launch of $DRV. Congratulations!

item.title:
RT by @KAndrewHuang: Just launched: @Powerloom Mainnet, the L2 that gives builders the onchain data they need.
Powerloom is built on @Optimism OP Stack, settles on Ethereum, and uses @eigen_da for data availability, plus @superbridgeapp for native bridge UI.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Just launched: @Powerloom Mainnet, the L2 that gives builders the onchain data they need.

Powerloom is built on @Optimism OP Stack, settles on Ethereum, and uses @eigen_da for data availability, plus @superbridgeapp for native bridge UI.

nitter.freedit.eu/Powerloom/status/1877485168241311883#m
